SELECT a.EMP_CD, EMP_NM, EMP_CN_NM, EMP_EN_NM, RESIDENT_NO, JOIN_DATE, JOIN_CLASS_CD, POSITION_CD, DUTY_CD, LAST_APPOINT_DATE, POSITION_UPDATED_DATE, ORG_CD, JOB_FAMILY_CD, JOB_CD, ASSIGNED_TASK, OFFICE_PHONE1, OFFICE_PHONE2, OFFICE_PHONE3, HOME_PHONE1, HOME_PHONE2, HOME_PHONE3, CELL_PHONE1, CELL_PHONE2, CELL_PHONE3, EMAIL, RELIGION_CD, LAST_SCHOOL_NM, MAJOR_NM, SCHOOL_CAREER_CD, HOUSE_KIND_CD, ZIP_CD, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, IS_VETERAN_WELFARE, IS_MILITARY_SERVICE, BIRTH_DATE, IS_LUNAR, HOPPY, TALENT, RETIRE_REASON, IS_MARRIAGE FROM HM_MEMBER_BASIC a
AND EMP_NM LIKE concat('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND EMP_CD LIKE concat('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND EMP_CD IS NOT NULL
AND POSITION_CD = #{CONTENT}
AND EMP_CD IS NOT NULL
AND ORG_CD = #{CONTENT}
ORDER BY EMP_CD
